snippet: General Electric posted first-quarter net profit of $3 billion and operating earnings of 33 cents a share, slightly above analysts’ estimate.
abstract: General Electric reports first-quarter 2014 profit of $3 billion, or 33 cents a share, down 15 percent from year-ago quarter profit of $3.5 billion, or 39 cents a share; revenue fell 2 percent to $34.2 billion.
lead_paragraph: General Electric posted first-quarter net profit of $3 billion and operating earnings of 33 cents a share, slightly above analysts’ estimate.

headline.main: G.E. Posts Strong Growth In Its Industrial Businesses
headline.print_headline: G.E. Posts Strong Growth In Its Industrial Businesses
